description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 4x + 9.
comments: n, 4*n+9, 16*n+45 and 64*n+189 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..150000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(4*n+9) and IsPrime(16*n+45) and IsPrime(64*n+189)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
